content:
Today I chose PR 17949 for discussion!

refactor(algebra/star/*): Allow for star operation on non-associative algebras
Created by @Christopher Hoskin (@mans0954) on 2022-12-14
Labels: awaiting-review, modifies-synchronized-file

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
This still has build errors; although it's also increasingly drowning under the tide
